title: 2022 Arkansas gubernatorial election
added: === Endorsements ===
{{Endorsements box
| list =
;Executive branch officials

* [[Donald Trump]], [[List of Presidents of the United States|45th]] [[President of the United States]]<ref>{{cite tweet |user=FogCityMidge|number=1353897123645808641|title=BREAKING: President Trump has given his ‚Äúcomplete & total endorsement‚Äù of Sarah Sanders for Governor of Arkansas. ‚ÄúA warrior who will always fight for the people of Arkansas & do what is right, not what is politically correct‚Äù. üá∫üá∏}}</ref>

* [[Mike Pompeo]], former [[United States Secretary of State|Secretary of State]] (2018‚Äì2021)<ref>{{cite tweet |last=Pompeo |first=Mike |user=mikepompeo |number=1353691110258991104 |date=January 25, 2021 |title=I worked with @SarahHuckabee. I'm all in to support her campaign to become next governor of Arkansas. |language=en |access-date=January 25, 2021}}</ref>

* [[Alyssa Farah]], former [[White House Director of Strategic Communications]] (2020) and Press Secretary of the [[United States Department of Defense|Department of Defense]] (2019‚Äì2020); former [[Office of the Vice President of the United States|Press Secretary to the Vice President]] (2017‚Äì2019)<ref>{{cite tweet|title=here for this.  @SarahHuckabee  is one of the kindest & most caring people. She's also a force, who loves her country & the state of Arkansas. |user=Alyssafarah|number=1353711122969452545 |website=Twitter |access-date=25 January 2021}}</ref>

* [[Stephen Miller (political advisor)|Stephen Miller]], former [[Senior Advisor to the President|Senior Advisor]] to President Donald Trump (2017‚Äì2021)<ref>{{cite tweet |title=I had the incredible privilege of getting to work alongside @SarahHuckabee.  Sarah is a leader of profound faith, powerful conviction, and true compassion.  She will always fight for what is right ‚Äî and she will make an extraordinary governor for the people of Arkansas. |user=StephenM|number=1353761954989531136 |website=Twitter |access-date=25 January 2021}}</ref>

* [[Dan Scavino]], former [[White House Deputy Chief of Staff]] for Communications (2019-2021) and Director of Social Media (2017-2021)<ref>{{cite tweet |title= Awesome seeing a great friend and the future Governor of Arkansas, @SarahHuckabee Sanders, at the White House this past week! Would love to see her run - do it Sarah |website=Twitter |user=DanScavino|number=1206367498934902784}}</ref>

* [[Mercedes Schlapp]], former White House Director of Strategic Communications (2017‚Äì2019)<ref>{{cite tweet |title=I have known  @SarahHuckabee  for years and worked closely with her. She is a strong, wise, and talented leader who will put the people of Arkansas first. |website=Twitter |user=mercedesschlapp|number=1353699783806955520}}</ref>
;U.S. Representatives

* [[Matt Gaetz]], [[United States House of Representatives|U.S. Representative]] for [[Florida's 1st congressional district]] (2017-present)<ref>{{cite tweet |last=Gaetz |first=Matt |user=mattgaetz |number=1353711323427852289 |date=January 25, 2021 |title=We support you 100 percent Sarah! |language=en |access-date=January 25, 2021}}</ref>

* [[Elise Stefanik]], U.S. Representative for [[New York's 21st congressional district]] (2015-present)<ref>{{cite tweet |title=America is all in for  @SarahHuckabee ‚Äì a great patriot, leader, and a friend! |user=EliseStefanik|number=1353694099728179200 |website=Twitter}}</ref>
;Governors

* [[Mike Huckabee]], former [[Governor of Arkansas]] (1996‚Äì2007) and candidate for [[President of the United States]] in [[Mike Huckabee 2008 presidential campaign|2008]] and [[Mike Huckabee 2016 presidential campaign|2016]] ''(candidate's father)''<ref>{{cite tweet |title=Today  @SarahHuckabee  just announced she's running to be 1st woman Governor of AR.  But it's not about her gender, but a lifetime of preparation. She's smart & compassionate, but fearless for what's right.  Join the fight! Contribute now! |user=GovMikeHuckabee|number=1353679277225598976 |website=Twitter}}</ref>
;Individuals

* [[Kimberly Guilfoyle]], television personality and senior advisor to [[Donald Trump's 2020 presidential campaign]]<ref>{{cite tweet |title=Sarah Huckabee Sanders for Governor https://youtu.be/opbMn-n76AQ via  @YouTube  Amen with you all the way, let's go  @SarahHuckabee! |user=kimguilfoyle|number=1353706790551248896}}</ref>

* [[Katrina Pierson]], former national spokesperson for [[Donald Trump 2016 presidential campaign|Donald Trump's 2016 presidential campaign]] and senior advisor to Donald Trump's 2020 presidential campaign<ref>{{cite tweet |title=Congratulations to my dear friend and sister in Christ,  @SarahHuckabee . I'm so happy and excited for next journey. You will be a phenomenal Governor for the people's Republic of Arkansas! |user=KatrinaPierson|number=1353729465331933186 |website=Twitter |access-date=25 January 2021}}</ref>

* [[Donald Trump Jr.]], businessman and son of former President [[Donald Trump]]<ref>{{cite tweet|user=donaldjtrumpjr|number=1353694079721336837|title=Let me know how I can help @SarahHuckabee! You‚Äôre going to win and you will be great!}}</ref>
